name: TETRACOSACTIDE
breadcrumbs: 6.5 Hypothalamic and pituitary hormones and anti-oestrogens
6.5.1 Hypothalamic and anterior pituitary hormones and anti-oestrogens
cautions:
Cautions as for corticosteroids, section 6.3.2; important: risk
of anaphylaxis (medical supervision; consult product literature); history of atopic allergy (e.g. asthma, eczema, hayfever); history of hypersensitivity; interactions: Appendix 1 (corticosteroids)
pregnancy: Pregnancy avoid (but may be used diagnostically if essential)
